bill.title: Credit unions; authorize to conduct savings promotion raffles.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 81-13-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Credit Unions To Conduct Savings Promotion Raffles; To Define "savings Promotion Raffle" As A Raffle Conducted By A Credit Union Where The Sole Consideration Required For A Chance Of Winning Designated Prizes Is The Deposit Of At Least A Specified Amount Of Money In A Savings Account Or Other Savings Program Offered By The Credit Union; To Provide That The Credit Union Shall Conduct A Savings Promotion Raffle So That Each Token Or Ticket Representing An Entry In The Raffle Has An Equal Chance Of Being Drawn; To Provide That A Credit Union Shall Not Conduct A Savings Promotion Raffle In A Manner That Jeopardizes The Credit Union's Safety And Soundness Or Misleads Its Members; To Authorize The Commissioner Of Banking To Examine The Conduct Of A Savings Promotion Raffle, And To Issue Cease And Desist Orders For Violations Of This Act; To Amend Sections 97-33-31 Through 97-33-49, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt Savings Promotion Raffles Conducted By Credit Unions From The Criminal Prohibitions Against Lotteries And Raffles; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Banking and Financial Services;Judiciary B
